problem_text_cn: 如图,E是▱ABCD内任一点,若S~▱ABCD~=8,则阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, E is any point in ▱ABCD, if S~▱ABCD~ = N_0, the area of ​​the shaded part is ()
raw_answer: 解:设两个阴影部分三角形的底为BC,AD,高分别为h~1~,h~2~,则h~1~+h~2~为平行四边形的高,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD=BC,∴S~△ECB~+S~△EAD~=\frac{1}{2}BC•h~1~+\frac{1}{2}AD•h~2~=\frac{1}{2}BC(h~1~+h~2~)=\frac{1}{2}S~四边形ABCD~=\frac{1}{2}×8=4．故选:B．
